exec: var names = "tournament cricket football marathon hockey music violin swimming sports boxing skiing tennis badminton tutoring mathematics dating parenting scuba diving walking drums biking mma kayak rowing climbing fencing #kicking #cycling #dancing #flute #piano #cooking #bowling #batting #cardio running #running";

var words = "Examining only those expressions of the will of #historical persons which, as commands, were related to events, historians have assumed that the events depended on those commands. But examining the events themselves and the connection in which #chennai #bangalore the historical persons stood to the people, we have found that they and their orders were dependent on events. The incontestable proof of this deduction is that, however many commands were issued, the event does not take place unless there are other causes for it, but as soon as an event occurs—be it what it may—then out of all the continually expressed wishes of different people some will always be found which by their meaning and their time of utterance are related as commands to the events. tournament cricket football marathon hockey music violin swimming #sports #boxing #skiing #tennis #badminton #tutoring #mathematics #dating parenting #scuba #diving walking drums biking mma kayak rowing climbing fencing #madurai #boston #usa #india";
